bibl.title: William Smith v. Territory of Washington. Subpoena.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, East Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Walla Walla County Government; Clerk, Territorial Court Civil/Criminal Case Files, 1860-1889

div1.p: Territory of Washington, County of Walla Walla } District Court, 1st Justicial District.

To Elisha Piry Martin Barily Henry Ousley You are hereby required to be and appear before the Hon. E. P. Oliphant at Chambers forthwith said Court, on the first day of the next term thereof at the city of Walla Walla in said County, to testify those things which you may know in a certain cause then and there to be tried, wherein Wm Smith Plaintiff and Territory of Washington is Defendant. on the part of defendant deff
Witness my hand and the seal of said Court, This 14th day of August A.D. 1862 B.N. Secton Clerk.
Served the within Supoena on the within named parties
